channel.title: Welcome message
channel.description:
I want it so that when a player logs in for the first time it comes up with a different welcome message then any other time the player will log in.
if you can post the code it will be much appreciated

item.title: Welcome message
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

PlayerAssistant.java, Find this:

public void addStarter() {

Then you will see the items people get when they start the game. At the bottom of that just add something like:

c.sendMessage("For 99 Attack, Strength, Range & Magic type ::pure!);

Read full topic
